employees.name: Jo-Anne Sinclair
employees.description: A chief executive officer, the highest-ranking person in a company or other institution, ultimately responsible for making managerial decisions.

employees.name: Jackson Smith
employees.description: The chief operating officer (COO) is responsible for executing and implementing the operational directives set by the CEO and the board of directors.

employees.name: Susan Thomas
employees.description: A chief financial officer, a senior executive with responsibility for the financial affairs of a corporation or other institution. The vice president of administration position is responsible for directing all of the administrative functions of the corporation in accordance with industry standards, where applicable, regulatory agencies, as appropriate and company objectives and policies.

employees.name: Richa Kaur
employees.description: Responsible for the Consumer Banking division performing a variety of roles including lending, investing, risk management, marketing, and technology. Their team provides a suite of solutions to help our retail customers meet their financial goals. Also responsible for the Commercial Banking Division performing a variety of roles including lending, investing, risk management, marketing, and technology.

employees.name: Josee Benjamin
employees.description: Chief Information Officer (CIO), chief digital information officer (CDIO) or information technology (IT) director is a job title commonly given to the most senior executive in an bank responsible for the traditional information technology and computer systems that support bank goals.

employees.name: Vincent Grey
employees.description: Responsible for the overall strategic marketing plans for an entire organization (or lines of business and brands within an organization) in order to attract potential customers and retain existing ones.

employees.name: Rupa Kharki
employees.description: Sometimes called a compliance manager is to make sure that a company is conducting its business in full compliance with all national and international laws and regulations that pertain to its particular industry, as well as professional standards, accepted business practices.

employees.name: Xun Kuang
employees.description: May be responsible for a number of job duties related to organizational development, recruitment and staffing, employment law, performance management, employee relations, and compensation and benefits.

employees.name: Stien Pedersen
employees.description: The senior executive managing legal affairs for the company.

employees.name: Sandra Bear
employees.description: Manages the IT infrastructure, operations, and services; and how it enables businesses/individuals to access and make use of data and services.

employees.name: Gus Blue
employees.description: A chief information security officer (CISO) is the senior-level executive within an organization responsible for establishing and maintaining the bank security vision, strategy, and program to ensure information assets and technologies are adequately protected.

employees.name: Sam Kong
employees.description: Responsible for in analysis and reconciliation of accounts and in development and implementation of accounting policies, procedures and controls.

employees.name: Valentine Smith

employees.name: Mariya Kaperski

employees.name: Victoria Gray
employees.description: A key part of this role is performing full audits, including risk management, control management, and assessing financial reliability. The audit processes ensure that compliance is met within all the company's systems.

employees.name: Cheryl Guru
employees.description: Responsible for overall system architecture and technical direction.

employees.name: Jean Ngoy
employees.description: Plays a crucial role in designing and overseeing the implementation of security measures for an organization's information systems. employees.name: Yolanda Ferreira

departments.name: Manager Customer Experience and Community Eng.

employees.name: Jonathan Carberry
